title: Jessica Simpson: Blonde. Billionaire. Boss | Staying Power | 5
description:
Jessica Simpson has never stopped reinventing herself. Early in her career she went from pop star to reality star. Now she's a fashion mogul and author. Two decades into her career, she's still making waves. On this episode, culture writer Lindsay Mannering joins Aricia and Brooke to talk about their favorite Newlyweds moments, meeting Jessica at her Hidden Hills mansion, and Jessica’s enduring staying power.  


For more, check out Lindsay’s New York Times profile of Jessica Simpson: https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/29/style/jessica-simpson-memoir-alcohol-addiction.html
